questionDown: Which method is used to remove a specific element from a list by value?
What is the difference between append() and extend() in lists?

answers.B: append() adds an element; extend() adds each element from an iterable

answers.C: append() sorts the list; extend() adds an element

answers.E: append() replaces the list; extend() creates a new one
